text: Nothopegia heyneana is a species of plant in the family Anacardiaceae. It is endemic to India. ==References== * http://biotik.org/india/species/n/nothhehe/nothhehe_en.html Category:Flora of India (region) heyneana Category:Near threatened plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Nothopegia heyneana
